subject: RFQ Simsonn Pro
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,


Nice to meet you virtually!
We are a German manufacturer of haptic and acoustic components and will attend the SIM Racing Expo in Dortmund this year.
To present our parts in a very good way, we would like to have some professional equipment around with which our customers can experience our parts.
For this reason, I would like to ask you for a quotation for your parts:

Simsonn Pro
As seen for example here:
https://www.alibaba.com/product-detail/SIMSONN-PRO-Pedals-for-PC-Racing_10000016926196.html?spm=a2700.galleryofferlist.normal_offer.d_image.366313a0aD1Ipz
[Ein Bild, das Hebel, Im Haus enth?lt.  KI-generierte Inhalte k?nnen fehlerhaft sein.]

Simsonn Gear Shifter
[cid:image002.png@01DBD607.CFDB6A20]

Simsonn Racing Pressure Handbrake
[cid:image003.png@01DBD608.0F6325C0]


We will need 2pcs of each part.
Can you please send me a quotation for this?

If you like, we can also promote your parts during the exhibition. So, if you have, we would appreciate some small, free gimmicks that we can give to our customers and interested visitors to do that. Please indicate in your quotation if that is possible.

Please also add the lead time and the shipping costs to the quotation.


Looking very much forward to your reply!

With many warm greetings,

Rabea Richter
Assistant Technical Director
#gernperDu #CallMeByMyFirstName

rabea.richter@grewus.de<mailto:rabea.richter@grewus.de>
+49 (0) 4344 8150 353
Microsoft Teams Chat<mailto:https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=rabea.richter@grewus.de>

conversations.body_text: Hi Rabea Richter | GREWUS GmbH,  You can initiate an inquiry on Alibaba, and our sales team will communicate and negotiate with you accordingly.

Hi Simsonn Team,


Thank you for your fast reply!
Unfortunately, it is very difficult for us to initiate inquiries on Alibaba.
Can you please give me the e-mail contact of your sales team, so I can send our inquiry by mail?


With many thanks in advance and best greetings,

Rabea Richter
Assistant Technical Director
